title: The Boy
description: Being bullied is hurtful, scary, and confusing. When bullying is aggressive and physical, it can be dangerous. When it's emotional to hurt or frighten someone, often over a period of time, it is forcing that person to do something they do not want to do. Shawn grows up in a bad neighborhood while always being bullied during his school year and at home. Shawn decides to take the law into his own hands and teaches them a lesson.
author: Jeffery Krivensky
